title: Gemma Collins accused of editing her Instagram snaps to look slimmer
text:

Gemma Collins has been accused by her fans of editing her snaps in order to appear trimmer than she is.

The TOWIE star, 38, shared a glamorous snap onto her Instagram page on Thursday where she looked remarkably thinner - which led to some of her followers believing the image had been edited.

The striking snap showed the curvy star wowing in a snake print peplum blouse teamed with matching trousers.

She completed her stylish ensemble with a face of expertly applied make-up and her platinum blonde locks were styled in loose waves and decorated with gemstone hairclips.

Fans believed their accusations were backed up as the tiles and skirting board behind the star in the offering appeared wonky and took to the comments to slam the star.

(Image: Gemma Collins/Instagram)

One commented: "I applaud you on your weight loss but photoshopping not only deceives others but ultimately yourself."

One micro-blogger added: "Weight loss or filter?"

Another inspected the picture, before adding: "Skirting board is wonky behind legs and shadow doesn’t look right, am I the only one seeing this?"

"Still airbrushing your pictures?" asked another alongside a laughing emoji face icon.

"It's obvious Gemma is deceiving her fans by airbrushing her pictures" chimed in another.

It comes after she opened up about her battle with weight gain since dramas surrounding her ex James 'Arg' Argent began escalating.

(Image: Gemma Collins/Instagram)

The reality TV diva has admitted to over indulging with food, especially since she called emergency services with fears about Arg last week.

The star had been showing off her new slimline figure in recent weeks but has said the stress of the situation had led to her to 'fall off the wagon' and has been 'over eating' in recent days.

Speaking at the launch of her new fragrance, Diva Pink, on Monday, Gemma said: "I ain’t stopped eating. I’ve had a lot of stress and I’ve not been to the gym in two weeks.

“I’ve been unwell all weekend with a chest infection.”

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

Gemma is reportedly heading out to Dubai in the hope of taking a break from the problems that have dogged her ex in recent weeks.

It would seem that Gemma is going to keep her diet on the back burner while she enjoys a holiday in the sun.

The GC said: “When I come back, I will get back on it.

"I always come out on top. My life always goes a bit t***-up but I carry on.”

(Image: Instagram)

When she gets back, it looks like there will be plenty to keep Gemma busy, as she prepares too launch her singing career with a debut single produced by Naughty Boy and a return to Dancing On Ice, with a turn in the Christmas Special.

Speaking about her schedule, Gemma said: "I’ve got lots of projects on the table, so it’s exciting.”

description: The TOWIE star shared a snap that flaunted her epic weight-loss but fans questioned if she had photoshopped the image
